amount.label: Amount
amount.help: The total amount of the statement in EUR.

import.title: Import Statements
import.description: Here you can import exported statements in the MT940 and CAMT052 format from online banking. Matches with existing statements or transactions are automatically detected and skipped.

notification.success: {{total_statements_created}} statements were imported. {{total_statements_skipped}} statements were skipped (duplicate or erroneous).

import.help: Supports the formats MT940 and CAMT 052 (and possibly other CAMT formats) with files ending in *.mta, *.sta, *.txt, *.mt940, and *.xml.
